data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Mandsaur.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mandsaur, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Mandsaur, Madhya Pradesh, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Mandsaur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Mandsaur, Madhya Pradesh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Bhil Kataria people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Bhil Kataria people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Bhil Kataria people is yours.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Mandsaur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Mandsaur, Madhya Pradesh, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,309,392 lost people in  Mandsaur, Madhya Pradesh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
